original_title: Swallow The Sun: 20 Years of Gloom, Beauty, and Despair - Live in Helsinki
overview: During its 20th anniversary tour, Finnish melodic/doom/death metal band Swallow The Sun performs live in the Tavastia Club in Helsinki on February 26, 2020. The concert consists of an acoustic set alongside a fan-voted one celebrating the band's classics.
tagline: The first ever live release by the Finnish doom masters.
title: Swallow The Sun: 20 Years of Gloom, Beauty, and Despair - Live in Helsinki
